name: WPGen Forms – Create Forms with help of Generative AI ( AI Forms, Generative Forms )
author: Gnanasekaran R

sections.description:
Simple and easy to use plugin to create WordPress forms with the help of Generative AI.

Form Generative plugin (Forms AI) to create WordPress forms like contact form 7 and wpforms, etc…

With help of this plugin, you can create WordPress forms and checklists with the prompt. This plugin uses OpenAI’s to generate forms. You can create forms easily and with in sec. This plugin is in the initial stage and we are working on it to make it more user-friendly and more features.

⏩ Use of 3rd Party Services

To improve the user experience and to provide the best service, WPGen Forms uses the following services.

  • OpenAI: To generate forms by given prompt. OpenAI TOS and Privacy Policy

Features

  • Create forms with the help of AI
  • Supports Contact Form 7
  • Supports WPForms

Other Upcoming Features

  • More form types
  • More form plugins support
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your website.
  2. Activate it.
  3. Go to the plugin settings page and update the openAI API key.
  4. Create a new form and use the AI to generate the form.
  5. Done.
sections.changelog:

  • Publish plugin.
